id: Top US military officer says Taliban 'are not losing'
paragraph: By Jamie Crawford, CNNUpdated 5:57 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)The top US military officer said Saturday that the Taliban "are not losing" in Afghanistan, and much more needs to be done to bring peace to the war-torn country.
